member.name: T:NPack.QrDecomposition`1
member.summary: QR decomposition for a rectangular matrix.
member.remarks: For an m-by-n Matrix{T} A with m >= n, the QR decomposition is an m-by-n orthogonal Matrix{T} Q and an n-by-n upper triangular Matrix{T} R so that A = Q * R. The QR decompostion always exists, even if the Matrix{T} does not have full rank, so the constructor will never fail. The primary use of the QR decomposition is in the least squares solution of nonsquare systems of simultaneous linear equations. This will fail if returns .

member.name: M:NPack.QrDecomposition`1.#ctor(NPack.Interfaces.IMatrix{`0})
member.summary: Construct a QR decomposition.

member.name: M:NPack.QrDecomposition`1.Solve(NPack.Interfaces.IMatrix{`0})
member.summary: Least squares solution of A * X = B.
member.param: Right-hand-side Matrix{T} with as many rows as A and any number of columns.
member.returns: A Matrix{T} that minimized the two norm of Q * R * X - B.
member.exception: Matrix{T} row dimensions must be the same.
Matrix{T} is rank deficient.

member.name: P:NPack.QrDecomposition`1.IsFullRank
member.summary: Gets a value which indicates if the Matrix{T} A is of full rank.
member.value: if R, and hence A, has full rank; otherwise.

member.name: P:NPack.QrDecomposition`1.Q
member.summary: Returns the orthogonal factor Q.

member.name: P:NPack.QrDecomposition`1.R
member.summary: Returns the upper triangular factor R.

member.name: T:NPack.LuDecomposition`1
member.summary: LU decomposition of a rectangular matrix.
member.typeparam: The type of the matrix element.

remarks.para: For an m-by-n Matrix{T} A with m >= n, the LU decomposition is an m-by-n unit lower triangular Matrix{T} L, an n-by-n upper triangular Matrix{T} U, and a permutation vector Pivot of length m so that Pivot * A = L * U. If m < n, then L is m-by-m and U is m-by-n.

The LU decompostion with pivoting always exists, even if the Matrix{T} is singular, so the constructor will never fail. The primary use of the LU decomposition is in the solution of square systems of simultaneous linear equations. There is no solution, or infinite solutions if returns .

member.summary: Create a new LU decomposition.

member.summary: Solves a set of equation systems of type A * X = B.
member.param: Right hand side with as many rows as A and any number of columns.
member.returns: X so that L * U * X = B.

member.summary: Gets the determinant of the matrix.
member.exception: Thrown if the matrix used to compute the factorization is non-square.

member.name: T:NPack.ClrMatrixOperations`1
member.summary: Pure managed code matrix operations implementation.
member.remarks: Uses fully managed code (no C++ or native interop) to calculate matrix operations. While not as highly performing as other operations engines, it can be used in partial trust environments.
member.typeparam: Type of element in matricies.
